engine_version.description: The major version number of the cache engine to be used for the clusters. If not provided, the major version is defaulted to 4.0

eviction_policy.description: The eviction policy for keys when maximum memory usage is reached. Default is 'noeviction'

engine_version.description: The major version number of the cache engine to be used for the clusters. If not provided, the major version is defaulted to 4.0

eviction_policy.description: The eviction policy for keys when maximum memory usage is reached. Default is 'noeviction'

abap_endpoint_timeout.description: Timeout for requests issued by approuter to ABAP backend

addon_product_name.description: Registered name of the addon product. Will be passed through to ABAP OEM Plan

addon_product_version.description: Version of the addon product that should be installed. Will be passed through to ABAP OEM Plan

consumer_id_pattern.description: String containing a regular expression with a capturing group. The subdomain of the consumer is matched against this regular expression. The value of the first capturing group is used as consumer id.

consumer_tenant_limit.description: Maximum number of tenants in ABAP System

provider_admin_email.description: Email address of initial provider user. Will be passed through to ABAP OEM Plan

size_of_persistence.description: Default size of the ABAP system (in blocks of the size 16 GB). Will be passed through to ABAP OEM Plan

size_of_runtime.description: Default size of the HANA database (in blocks of the size 16 GB) of the ABAP System. Will be passed through to ABAP OEM Plan

tenant_mode.description: Decides whether a customer will have a tenant in a dedicated system (single) or a shared system (multi)

usage.description: Whether it is a test or productive solution

xsappname.description: xsappname used for the OAuth clone during the instance creation
